inputs.description: Files to copy (comma-separated, relative paths from project root)

tasks.label: Copy changed files to Mylar container
tasks.command: CONTAINER=$(docker ps --filter 'name=mylar' --format '{{.Names}}' | head -1); if [ -z "$CONTAINER" ]; then echo '‚ùå Mylar container not found!'; exit 1; fi; echo 'üì¶ Copying files to container: $CONTAINER'; echo "${input:filesToCopy}" | tr ',' '\n' | while read file; do file=$(echo "$file" | xargs); if [ -n "$file" ] && [ -f "$file" ]; then echo "Copying $file..."; docker cp "$file" $CONTAINER:/app/mylar/"$file" && echo "‚úÖ $file copied" || echo "‚ö†Ô∏è  Failed to copy $file"; else echo "‚ö†Ô∏è  File not found: $file"; fi; done; echo '‚úÖ Done!'

tasks.label: Copy all changed files to Mylar container
tasks.command: CONTAINER=$(docker ps --filter 'name=mylar' --format '{{.Names}}' | head -n 1); if [ -z "$CONTAINER" ]; then echo '‚ùå Mylar container not found!'; exit 1; fi; echo 'üì¶ Copying all changed files to container: $CONTAINER'; git diff --name-only HEAD | while read file; do if [ -f "$file" ]; then echo "Copying $file..."; docker cp "$file" $CONTAINER:/app/mylar/"$file" 2>/dev/null || echo "‚ö†Ô∏è  Failed to copy $file"; fi; done; echo '‚úÖ Done!'
